title: Greg Miller's Marvel Rivals Impressions
description:
Greg Played Marvel Rivals... and it isn't for him. 

But, he does miss Marvel Heroes :( 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xYZH7Pm6tWI 

Head over to KindaFunny.com/store to pick up your copy of Portillo the Wiener Dog Thinks He’s a Manatee and the new line of Portillo merch!


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
---------------------------------------------------  
YouTube: Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/kindafunny/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kindafunnyvids/
TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames?lang=en
